attributes.action: Manston Airport- The Solution to Britain's Aviation Requirements
attributes.additional_details:
-The Government should start to develop Manston Airport in Kent to be the solution to the current aviation requirements facing the United Kingdom, particularly those in the South East.

-The Government should do this as the airport already has a large runway and space to expand its existing facilities.

-The Government will need to do this to safeguard the other areas in Kent and the Thames Estuary that have been considered for a new airport.

-The Government needs to stop wasting Public money on New Airports and focus on this existing infrastructure.
